content: **more languages** danish 1 norwegian 2 swedish 3 german 4 dutch 5 **pattern information** happy is a beginner friendly raglan cardigan in a joyful mix of panettone and diablo the cardigan is short with wide sleeves a pretty collar and glitter buttons **materials** 6 7 8 9 9 skeins of panettone color 03 2 2 2 3 3 skeins of diablo color 59 circular needles 4 mm 40 cm and 80 cm circular needles 7 mm 40 cm and 80 cm buttons glitter 18 mm 5 5 6 6 6 stitch markers **yarn quality** panettone hobbii 87% cotton 7% polyamide 6% metallic fibre 50 g 1 75 oz = 120 m 131 yds diablo hobbii 40% acrylic 30% mohair 30% polyamide 25 g 0 9 oz = 225 m 246 yds **gauge** 10 x 10 cm 4 x 4 = 14 sts x 20 row **size** s m l xl 2xl **measurements** length 40 42 44 46 46 cm/ 15 7 16 5 17 3 18 1 inches circumference 104 110 118 124 130 cm/ 40 9 43 3 46 5 48 8 51 2 inches **hashtags for social media** #hobbiihappy #hobbiidesign 1 https //hobbii dk/happy-cardigan utm_medium=social&utm_source=ravelry&utm_campaign=pattern/maria-soelvtofte&utm_content=happy-cardigan+hbtrack&utm_term=karen 2 https //hobbii no/happy-cardigan utm_medium=social&utm_source=ravelry&utm_campaign=pattern/maria-soelvtofte&utm_content=happy-cardigan+hbtrack&utm_term=karen 3 https //hobbii se/happy-cardigan utm_medium=social&utm_source=ravelry&utm_campaign=pattern/maria-soelvtofte&utm_content=happy-cardigan+hbtrack&utm_term=karen 4 https //hobbii de/happy-cardigan utm_medium=social&utm_source=ravelry&utm_campaign=pattern/maria-soelvtofte&utm_content=happy-cardigan+hbtrack&utm_term=karen 5 https //hobbii nl/happy-cardigan utm_medium=social&utm_source=ravelry&utm_campaign=pattern/maria-soelvtofte&utm_content=happy-cardigan+hbtrack&utm_term=karen
